body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.8.12 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/releases/tag/1.5.3

1.5.0-1.5.2 had some issues with `py-torch~distributed`. 1.5.0 hasn't appeared in a Spack release yet so I just removed it without deprecating it. Let me know if that's an issue and I can restore it.
title: py-pytorch-lightning: add v1.5.3
